text: Soni akutiji: “Ayi ilangoyi ni asi mbejusi iwele yaakanyisyidwa, pangali watalye yalakweyi ikaweje watukwasaka,” – mukulitwanjila kwao. Soni ilango ine ikanyisyidwe migongo jakwe (kujikwela kapena kutwichilila misigo). Sano ilango ine ngaakukolangaga lina lya Allah pakuisikita, gamba kunsepela unami Jwalakwe. Chachalipila pa yawaliji nkusepelela
